Home Range Construction by Two Methods

Source: R/constructions.r
construct.Rd

Home Range Construction by Two Methods

construct(df, type = c("klocoh", "akde"), proj4)

Arguments

df

a dataframe containing columns x, y, date representing relocations in space and time.
type

a character string indicating the type/s of constructions to build, "klocoh" or "akde"
proj4

a character string indicating the proj.4 definition of the coordinate reference system defining the relocations

Examples

klocoh <- construct(AG195, type = "klocoh", proj = "+proj=utm +zone=33 +south")
#>

akde <- construct(AG195, type = "akde", proj = "+proj=utm +zone=33 +south")
#> Be aware, fitting an akde can take several minutes.
#> Minimum sampling interval of 20 minutes in unknown
